00026 // lbann_exception .hpp .cpp - LBANN exception class
00028 
00029 #ifndef LBANN_EXCEPTION_HPP_INCLUDED
00030 #define LBANN_EXCEPTION_HPP_INCLUDED
00031 
00032 #include "lbann/lbann_base.hpp"
00033 #include "lbann/lbann_comm.hpp"
00034 #include <iostream>
00035 #include <exception>
00036 
00037 using namespace El;
00038 
00039 namespace lbann
00040 {
00041   class lbann_exception : public std::exception
00042   {
00043   public:
00044     lbann_exception(const std::string m="my custom exception"):msg(m){}
00045     ~lbann_exception(void) {}
00046     const char* what(){return msg.c_str();}
00047 
00048   private:
00049     std::string msg;
00050   };
00051 
00052   inline void lbann_report_exception( lbann_exception& e, lbann_comm *comm=NULL, std::ostream& os=std::cerr)
00053   {
00054     if( std::string(e.what()) != "" ) {
00055       if(comm != NULL) {
00056         os << "LBANN: rank " << comm->get_rank_in_model() << " of model " << comm->get_model_rank() <<" caught error message:";
00057       }else {
00058         os << "LBANN: caught error message:";
00059       }
00060       os << "\t" << e.what() << std::endl;
00061     }
00062     El::mpi::Abort( El::mpi::COMM_WORLD, 1 );
00063   }
00064 }
00065 
00066 #endif // LBANN_EXCEPTION_HPP_INCLUDED
